text: [Ej pajomʙar, ashoʙat] az tu dar ʙorai saroʙ va qimor mepursand, ʙigu: "Dar on du gunohi ʙuzurg va [niz] sudhoe ʙaroi mardum vucud dorad, vale gunohi on du az sudason [ʙestar va] ʙuzurgtar ast"; va az tu mepursand, ci cize infoq kunand, ʙigu: "On ci afzun ojad [az nijozmandii xud]. Alloh taolo ojotro incunin ʙaroi sumo ravsan mesozad; ʙosad, ki ʙijandesed
